implementationsPageData.contentHtml:
Implementations

SSZ is a language agnostic format, and acts as a type system for your data. Below is a list of known active projects implementing SSZ in different languages.

Implementations

  • Python

    • Trinity
    • Eth2.py

  • TypeScript

    • Lodestar

  • C#

    • Cortex

  • Rust

    • Lighthouse

  • Nim

    • Nimbus
